title: Oscal Package Schema
$comment: OSCAR Package: Transformed JSON Schema, Known error (there are some arrays that were converted to strings)

part.title: Part
part.description: A partition of a control's definition or a child of another part.

id.title: Part Identifier
id.description: A unique identifier for a specific part instance. This identifier's uniqueness is document scoped and is intended to be consistent for the same part across minor revisions of the document.

name.title: Part Name
name.description: A textual label that uniquely identifies the part's semantic type.

ns.title: Part Namespace
ns.description: A namespace qualifying the part's name. This allows different organizations to associate distinct semantics with the same name.

class.title: Part Class
class.description: A textual label that provides a sub-type or characterization of the part's name. This can be used to further distinguish or discriminate between the semantics of multiple parts of the same control with the same name and ns.

title.title: Part Title
title.description: A name given to the part, which may be used by a tool for display and navigation.

prose.title: Part Text
prose.description: Permits multiple paragraphs, lists, tables etc.

parameter.title: Parameter
parameter.description: Parameters provide a mechanism for the dynamic assignment of value(s) in a control.

id.title: Parameter Identifier
id.description: A unique identifier for a specific parameter instance. This identifier's uniqueness is document scoped and is intended to be consistent for the same parameter across minor revisions of the document.

class.title: Parameter Class
class.description: A textual label that provides a characterization of the parameter.

label.title: Parameter Label
label.description: A short, placeholder name for the parameter, which can be used as a subsitute for a value if no value is assigned.

usage.title: Parameter Usage Description
usage.description: Describes the purpose and use of a parameter

parameter-constraint-test.title: Constraint Test
parameter-constraint-test.description: A test expression which is expected to be evaluated by a tool.

expression.title: Constraint test
expression.description: A formal (executable) expression of a constraint

parameter-constraint.title: Constraint
parameter-constraint.description: A formal or informal expression of a constraint or test

description.title: Constraint Description
description.description: A textual summary of the constraint to be applied.

parameter-guideline.title: Guideline
parameter-guideline.description: A prose statement that provides a recommendation for the use of a parameter.

prose.title: Guideline Text
prose.description: Prose permits multiple paragraphs, lists, tables etc.

parameter-value.title: Parameter Value
parameter-value.description: A parameter value or set of values.

parameter-selection-parameter-choice.title: Choice
parameter-selection-parameter-choice.description: A value selection among several such options

how-many.title: Parameter Cardinality
how-many.description: Describes the number of selections that must occur.

metadata-revision.title: Revision History Entry
metadata-revision.description: An entry in a sequential list of revisions to the containing document in reverse chronological order (i.e., most recent previous revision first).

title.title: Document Title
title.description: A name given to the document revision, which may be used by a tool for display and navigation.

published.title: Publication Timestamp
published.description: The date and time the document was published. The date-time value must be formatted according to RFC 3339 with full time and time zone included.

last-modified.title: Last Modified Timestamp
last-modified.description: The date and time the document was last modified. The date-time value must be formatted according to RFC 3339 with full time and time zone included.

version.title: Document Version
version.description: A string used to distinguish the current version of the document from other previous (and future) versions.

oscal-version.title: OSCAL version
oscal-version.description: The OSCAL model version the document was authored against.

metadata-document-id.title: Document Identifier
metadata-document-id.description: A document identifier qualified by an identifier type.

scheme.title: Document Identification Scheme
scheme.description: Qualifies the kind of document identifier.

metadata.title: Publication metadata
metadata.description: Provides information about the publication and availability of the containing document.

title.title: Document Title
title.description: A name given to the document, which may be used by a tool for display and navigation.

published.title: Publication Timestamp
published.description: The date and time the document was published. The date-time value must be formatted according to RFC 3339 with full time and time zone included.

last-modified.title: Last Modified Timestamp
last-modified.description: The date and time the document was last modified. The date-time value must be formatted according to RFC 3339 with full time and time zone included.

version.title: Document Version
version.description: A string used to distinguish the current version of the document from other previous (and future) versions.

oscal-version.title: OSCAL version
oscal-version.description: The OSCAL model version the document was authored against.

uuid.title: Satisfied Universally Unique Identifier
uuid.description: A globally unique identifier that can be used to reference this satisfied entry elsewhere in an OSCAL document. A UUID should be consistantly used for a given resource across revisions of the document.

location-address-addr-line.title: Address line
location-address-addr-line.description: A single line of an address.

location-address.title: Address
location-address.description: A postal address for the location.

city.title: City
city.description: City, town or geographical region for the mailing address.

state.title: State
state.description: State, province or analogous geographical region for mailing address

postal-code.title: Postal Code
postal-code.description: Postal or ZIP code for mailing address

country.title: Country Code
country.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code for the mailing address.

location-email-address.title: Email Address
location-email-address.description: An email address as defined by RFC 5322 Section 3.4.1.

type.title: type flag
type.description: Indicates the type of phone number.

location-url.title: Location URL
location-url.description: The uniform resource locator (URL) for a web site or Internet presence associated with the location.

location.title: Location
location.description: A location, with associated metadata that can be referenced.

title.title: Location Title
title.description: A name given to the location, which may be used by a tool for display and navigation.

location-uuid.title: Location Reference
location-uuid.description: References a location defined in metadata.

party-external-id.title: Party External Identifier
party-external-id.description: An identifier for a person or organization using a designated scheme. e.g. an Open Researcher and Contributor ID (ORCID)

scheme.title: External Identifier Schema
scheme.description: Indicates the type of external identifier.

party-email-address.title: Email Address
party-email-address.description: An email address as defined by RFC 5322 Section 3.4.1.

type.title: type flag
type.description: Indicates the type of phone number.

party-address-addr-line.title: Address line
party-address-addr-line.description: A single line of an address.

party-address.title: Address
party-address.description: A postal address for the location.

city.title: City
city.description: City, town or geographical region for the mailing address.

state.title: State
state.description: State, province or analogous geographical region for mailing address

postal-code.title: Postal Code
postal-code.description: Postal or ZIP code for mailing address

country.title: Country Code
country.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code for the mailing address.

party-member-of-organization.title: Organizational Affiliation
party-member-of-organization.description: Identifies that the party object is a member of the organization associated with the provided UUID.

party.title: Party (organization or person)
party.description: A responsible entity which is either a person or an organization.

type.title: Party Type
type.description: A category describing the kind of party the object describes.

name.title: Party Name
name.description: The full name of the party. This is typically the legal name associated with the party.

short-name.title: Party Short Name
short-name.description: A short common name, abbreviation, or acronym for the party.

party-uuid.title: Party Reference
party-uuid.description: References a party defined in metadata.

role.title: Role
role.description: Defines a function assumed or expected to be assumed by a party in a specific situation.

id.title: Role Identifier
id.description: A unique identifier for a specific role instance. This identifier's uniqueness is document scoped and is intended to be consistent for the same role across minor revisions of the document.

title.title: Role Title
title.description: A name given to the role, which may be used by a tool for display and navigation.

short-name.title: Role Short Name
short-name.description: A short common name, abbreviation, or acronym for the role.

description.title: Role Description
description.description: A summary of the role's purpose and associated responsibilities.

role-id.title: Role Identifier Reference
role-id.description: A reference to the roles served by the user.

back-matter-resource-document-id.title: Document Identifier
back-matter-resource-document-id.description: A document identifier qualified by an identifier type.

scheme.title: Document Identification Scheme
scheme.description: Qualifies the kind of document identifier.

back-matter-resource-citation.title: Citation
back-matter-resource-citation.description: A citation consisting of end note text and optional structured bibliographic data.

biblio.title: Bibliographic Definition
biblio.description: A container for structured bibliographic information. The model of this information is undefined by OSCAL.

back-matter-resource-rlink.title: Resource link
back-matter-resource-rlink.description: A pointer to an external resource with an optional hash for verification and change detection.

href.title: Hypertext Reference
href.description: A resolvable URI reference to a resource.

media-type.title: Media Type
media-type.description: Specifies a media type as defined by the Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA) Media Types Registry.

back-matter-resource-base64.title: Base64
back-matter-resource-base64.description: The Base64 alphabet in RFC 2045 - aligned with XSD.

filename.title: File Name
filename.description: Name of the file before it was encoded as Base64 to be embedded in a resource. This is the name that will be assigned to the file when the file is decoded.

media-type.title: Media Type
media-type.description: Specifies a media type as defined by the Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA) Media Types Registry.

back-matter-resource.title: Resource
back-matter-resource.description: A resource associated with content in the containing document. A resource may be directly included in the document base64 encoded or may point to one or more equavalent internet resources.

title.title: Resource Title
title.description: A name given to the resource, which may be used by a tool for display and navigation.

description.title: Resource Description
description.description: A short summary of the resource used to indicate the purpose of the resource.

back-matter.title: Back matter
back-matter.description: A collection of resources, which may be included directly or by reference.

property.title: Property
property.description: An attribute, characteristic, or quality of the containing object expressed as a namespace qualified name/value pair. The value of a property is a simple scalar value, which may be expressed as a list of values in some OSCAL formats.

name.title: Property Name
name.description: A textual label that uniquely identifies a specific attribute, characteristic, or quality of the property's containing object.

ns.title: Property Namespace
ns.description: A namespace qualifying the property's name. This allows different organizations to associate distinct semantics with the same name.

class.title: Property Class
class.description: A textual label that provides a sub-type or characterization of the property's name. This can be used to further distinguish or discriminate between the semantics of multiple properties of the same object with the same name and ns.

annotation.title: Annotated Property
annotation.description: An attribute, characteristic, or quality of the containing object expressed as a namespace qualified name/value pair with optional explanatory remarks. The value of an annotated property is a simple scalar value.

name.title: Annotated Property Name
name.description: A textual label that uniquely identifies a specific attribute, characteristic, or quality of the annotated property's containing object.

ns.title: Annotated Property Namespace
ns.description: A namespace qualifying the annotated property's name. This allows different organizations to associate distinct semantics with the same name.

value.title: Annotated Property Value
value.description: Indicates the value of the attribute, characteristic, or quality.

link.title: Link
link.description: A reference to a local or remote resource

href.title: Hypertext Reference
href.description: A resolvable URL reference to a resource.

rel.title: Relation
rel.description: Describes the type of relationship provided by the link. This can be an indicator of the link's purpose.

media-type.title: Media Type
media-type.description: Specifies a media type as defined by the Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA) Media Types Registry.

text.title: Link Text
text.description: A textual label to associate with the link, which may be used for presentation in a tool.

responsible-party.title: Responsible Party
responsible-party.description: A reference to a set of organizations or persons that have responsibility for performing a referenced role in the context of the containing object.

responsible-role.title: Responsible Role
responsible-role.description: A reference to one or more roles with responsibility for performing a function relative to the containing object.

hash.title: Hash
hash.description: A representation of a cryptographic digest generated over a resource using a specified hash algorithm.

algorithm.title: Hash algorithm
algorithm.description: Method by which a hash is derived

remarks.title: Remarks
remarks.description: Additional commentary on the containing object.

group.title: Control group
group.description: A group of (selected) controls or of groups of controls

id.title: Group Identifier
id.description: A unique identifier for a specific group instance that can be used to reference the group within this and in other OSCAL documents. This identifier's uniqueness is document scoped and is intended to be consistent for the same group across minor revisions of the document.

class.title: Group Class
class.description: A textual label that provides a sub-type or characterization of the group.

title.title: Group Title
title.description: A name given to the group, which may be used by a tool for display and navigation.

control.title: Control
control.description: A structured information object representing a security or privacy control. Each security or privacy control within the Catalog is defined by a distinct control instance.

id.title: Control Identifier
id.description: A unique identifier for a specific control instance that can be used to reference the control in other OSCAL documents. This identifier's uniqueness is document scoped and is intended to be consistent for the same control across minor revisions of the document.

class.title: Control Class
class.description: A textual label that provides a sub-type or characterization of the control.

title.title: Control Title
title.description: A name given to the control, which may be used by a tool for display and navigation.

system-component-status.title: Status
system-component-status.description: Describes the operational status of the system component.

system-component.title: Component
system-component.description: A defined component that can be part of an implemented system.

type.title: Component Type
type.description: A category describing the purpose of the component.

title.title: Component Title
title.description: A human readable name for the system component.

description.title: Component Description
description.description: A description of the component, including information about its function.

purpose.title: Purpose
purpose.description: A summary of the technological or business purpose of the component.

protocol.title: Service Protocol Information
protocol.description: Information about the protocol used to provide a service.

name.title: Protocol Name
name.description: The common name of the protocol, which should be the appropriate "service name" from the IANA Service Name and Transport Protocol Port Number Registry.

title.title: title field
title.description: A human readable name for the protocol (e.g., Transport Layer Security).

port-range.title: Port Range
port-range.description: Where applicable this is the IPv4 port range on which the service operates.

start.title: Start
start.description: Indicates the starting port number in a port range

end.title: End
end.description: Indicates the ending port number in a port range

system-user.title: System User
system-user.description: A type of user that interacts with the system based on an associated role.

title.title: User Title
title.description: A name given to the user, which may be used by a tool for display and navigation.

short-name.title: User Short Name
short-name.description: A short common name, abbreviation, or acronym for the user.

description.title: User Description
description.description: A summary of the user's purpose within the system.

authorized-privilege.title: Privilege
authorized-privilege.description: Identifies a specific system privilege held by the user, along with an associated description and/or rationale for the privilege.

title.title: title field
title.description: A human readable name for the privilege.

description.title: Privilege Description
description.description: A summary of the privilege's purpose within the system.

function-performed.title: Functions Performed
function-performed.description: Describes a function performed for a given authorized privilege by this user class.

inventory-item-implemented-component.title: Implemented Component
inventory-item-implemented-component.description: The set of components that are implemented in a given system inventory item.

component-uuid.title: Component Universally Unique Identifier Reference
component-uuid.description: A reference to a component that is implemented as part of an inventory item.

inventory-item.title: Inventory Item
inventory-item.description: A single managed inventory item within the system.

description.title: Inventory Item Description
description.description: A summary of the inventory item stating its purpose within the system.

set-parameter-parameter-value.title: Parameter Value
set-parameter-parameter-value.description: A parameter value or set of values.

set-parameter.title: Set Parameter Value
set-parameter.description: Identifies the parameter that will be set by the enclosed value.

system-id.title: System Identification
system-id.description: A unique identifier for the system described by this system security plan.

identifier-type.title: Identification System Type
identifier-type.description: Identifies the identification system from which the provided identifier was assigned.

import-ssp.title: Import System Security Plan
import-ssp.description: Used by the assessment plan and POA&M to import information about the system.

href.title: System Security Plan Reference
href.description: >A resolvable URL reference to the system security plan for the system being assessed.

local-objective.title: Assessment-Specific Control Objective
local-objective.description: A local definition of a control objective for this assessment. Uses catalog syntax for control objective and assessment actions.

control-id.title: Control Identifier Reference
control-id.description: A reference to a control identifier.

description.title: Objective Description
description.description: A human-readable description of this control objective.

assessment-method.title: Assessment Method
assessment-method.description: A local definition of a control objective. Uses catalog syntax for control objective and assessment actions.

description.title: Assessment Method Description
description.description: A human-readable description of this assessment method.

activity-step.title: Action
activity-step.description: Identifies an individual actions, such as test steps or examination procedures.

title.title: Action Title
title.description: The title for this action.

description.title: Action Description
description.description: A human-readable description of this action.

activity.title: Activity
activity.description: Identifies an assessment or related process that can be performed. In the assessment plan, this is an intended activity which may be associated with an assessment task. In the assessment results, this an activity that was actually performed as part of an assessement.

title.title: Included Activity Title
title.description: The title for this included activity.

description.title: Included Activity Description
description.description: A human-readable description of this included activity.

action-timing-on-date.title: On Date Condition
action-timing-on-date.description: The event is intended to occur on the specified date.

date.title: On Date Condition
date.description: The event must occur on the specified date.

action-timing-within-date-range.title: On Date Range Condition
action-timing-within-date-range.description: The event is intended to occur within the specified date range.

start.title: Start Date Condition
start.description: The event must occur on or after the specified date.

end.title: End Date Condition
end.description: The event must occur on or before the specified date.

action-timing-at-frequency.title: Frequency Condition
action-timing-at-frequency.description: The event is intended to occur at the specified frequency.

period.title: Period
period.description: The event must occur after the specified period has elapsed.

unit.title: Time Unit
unit.description: The unit of time for the period.

action-timing.title: Event Timing
action-timing.description: The timing under which the event is intended to occur.

action-associated-activity-assessment-su.title: Assessment Subject Source
action-associated-activity-assessment-su.description: Assessment subjects will be identified while conducting the referenced activity-instance.

activity-instance-uuid.title: Activity Instance Universally Unique Identifier
activity-instance-uuid.description: Uniquely identifies an assessment activity to be performed as part of the event. This UUID may be referenced elsewhere in an OSCAL document when refering to this information. A UUID should be consistantly used for this schedule across revisions of the document.

action-associated-activity-assessment-su.title: Assessment Subject Placeholder
action-associated-activity-assessment-su.description: Used when the assessment subjects will be determined as part of one or more other assessment activities. These assessment subjects will be recorded in the assessment results.

description.title: Assessment Subject Placeholder Description
description.description: A human-readable description of intent of this assessment subject placeholder.

action-associated-activity.title: Associated Activity
action-associated-activity.description: Identifies an individual activity to be performed as part of an action.

activity-uuid.title: Activity Universally Unique Identifier Reference
activity-uuid.description: References an activity defined in the list of activities.

action.title: Action
action.description: Identifies an assessment-related event that must occur as part of executing an assessment plan, the result of which may be recorded within the assessment log in assessment results.

title.title: Event Title
title.description: The title for this event.

description.title: Event Description
description.description: A human-readable description of this event.

task.title: Task
task.description: Represents a scheduled event or milestone, which may be associated with a series of assessment actions.

title.title: Task Title
title.description: The title for this task.

description.title: Task Description
description.description: A human-readable description of this task.

start.title: Task Start Date
start.description: The task must occur on or after the specified date.

end.title: Task End Date
end.description: The task must occur on or before the specified date.

reviewed-controls-control-selection-sele.title: Include Specific Statements
reviewed-controls-control-selection-sele.description: Used to constrain the selection to only specificly identified statements.

reviewed-controls-control-selection-sele.title: Select Control
reviewed-controls-control-selection-sele.description: Used to select a control for inclusion/exclusion based on the control's identifier. A set of statement identifiers can be optionally used to target the inclusion/exclusion to only specific control statements providing more granularity over the specific statements that are within the asessment scope.

control-id.title: Control Identifier Reference
control-id.description: A reference to a control identifier.

reviewed-controls-control-selection.title: Assessed Controls
reviewed-controls-control-selection.description: Identifies the controls being assessed. In the assessment plan, these are the planned controls. In the assessment results, these are the actual controls, and reflects any changes from the plan.

description.title: Assessed Controls Description
description.description: A human-readable description of in-scope controls specified for assessment.

include-all.title: All
include-all.description: A key word to indicate all.

reviewed-controls-control-objective-sele.title: Referened Control Objectives
reviewed-controls-control-objective-sele.description: Identifies the control objectives of the assessment. In the assessment plan, these are the planned objectives. In the assessment results, these are the assessed objectives, and reflects any changes from the plan.

description.title: Control Ojectives Description
description.description: A human-readable description of this collection of control objectives.

include-all.title: All
include-all.description: A key word to indicate all.

reviewed-controls.title: Reviewed Controls and Control Objectives
reviewed-controls.description: Identifies the controls being assessed and their control objectives.

description.title: Control Objective Description
description.description: A human-readable description of control objectives.

select-objective-by-id.title: Select Objective
select-objective-by-id.description: Used to select a control objective for inclusion/exclusion based on the control objective's identifier.

assessment-subject.title: Subject of Assessment
assessment-subject.description: Identifies system elements being assessed, such as components, inventory items, and locations. In the assessment plan, this identifies a planned assessment subject. In the assessment results this is an actual assessment subject, and reflects any changes from the plan. exactly what will be the focus of this assessment. Any subjects not identified in this way are out-of-scope.

type.title: Subject Type
type.description: Indicates the type of assessment subject, such as a component, inventory, item, location, or party represented by this selection statement.

description.title: Include Subjects Description
description.description: A human-readable description of the collection of subjects being included in this assessment.

include-all.title: All
include-all.description: A key word to indicate all.

select-subject-by-id.title: Select Assessment Subject
select-subject-by-id.description: Identifies a set of assessment subjects to include/exclude by UUID.

uuid-ref.title: UUID Reference
uuid-ref.description: A pointer to a component, inventory-item, location, party, user, or resource using it's UUID.

assessment-assets-assessment-platform-us.title: Uses Component
assessment-assets-assessment-platform-us.description: The set of components that are used by the assessment platform.

component-uuid.title: Component Universally Unique Identifier Reference
component-uuid.description: A reference to a component that is implemented as part of an inventory item.

assessment-assets-assessment-platform.title: Assessment Platform
assessment-assets-assessment-platform.description: Used to represent the toolset used to perform aspects of the assessment.

title.title: Assessment Platform Title
title.description: The title or name for the assessment platform.

assessment-assets.title: Assessment Assets
assessment-assets.description: Identifies the assets used to perform this assessment, such as the assessment team, scanning tools, and assumptions.

objective-status.title: Objective Status
objective-status.description: Captures an assessor's conclusions regarding the degree to which an objective is satisfied.

control-id.title: Control Identifier Reference
control-id.description: A reference to a control identifier.

title.title: Objective Status Title
title.description: The title for this objective status.

description.title: Objective Status Description
description.description: A human-readable description of the assessor's conclusions regarding the degree to which an objective is satisfied.

status.title: Implementation Status
status.description: A brief indication as to whether the objective is satisfied or not within a given system.

observation-method.title: Observation Method
observation-method.description: Identifies how the observation was made.

observation-type.title: Observation Type
observation-type.description: Identifies the nature of the observation. More than one may be used to further qualify and enable filtering.

observation-subject-reference.title: Identifies the Subject
observation-subject-reference.description: A pointer to a resource based on its universally unique identifier (UUID). Use type to indicate whether the identified resource is a component, inventory item, location, user, or something else.

uuid-ref.title: UUID Reference
uuid-ref.description: A pointer to a component, inventory-item, location, party, user, or resource using it's UUID.

type.title: Universally Unique Identifier Reference Type
type.description: Used to indicate the type of object pointed to by the uuid-ref.

title.title: Subject Reference Title
title.description: The title or name for the referenced subject.

observation-relevant-evidence.title: Relevant Evidence
observation-relevant-evidence.description: Links this observation to relevant evidence.

href.title: Relevant Evidence Reference
href.description: >A resolvable URL reference to relevant evidence.

description.title: Relevant Evidence Description
description.description: A human-readable description of this evidence.

title.title: Observation Title
title.description: The title for this observation.

description.title: Observaton Description
description.description: A human-readable description of this assessment observation.

origin-actor.title: Assessment Actor
origin-actor.description: The actor that produces an observation, a finding, or a risk. One or more actor type can be used to specify a person that is using a tool.

uuid-ref.title: Actor UUID Reference
uuid-ref.description: A pointer to the tool or person based on the associated type.

role-id.title: Actor Role
role-id.description: For a party, this can optionally be used to specify the role the actor was performing.

origin.title: Origin
origin.description: Identifies the source of the finding, such as a tool, interviewed person, or activity.

threat-id.title: Threat ID
threat-id.description: A pointer, by ID, to an externally-defined threat.

system.title: Threat Type Identification System
system.description: Specifies the source of the threat information.

href.title: Threat Information Resource Reference
href.description: An optional location for the threat data, from which this ID originates.

risk-mitigating-factor-subject-reference.title: Identifies the Subject
risk-mitigating-factor-subject-reference.description: A pointer to a resource based on its universally unique identifier (UUID). Use type to indicate whether the identified resource is a component, inventory item, location, user, or something else.

uuid-ref.title: UUID Reference
uuid-ref.description: A pointer to a component, inventory-item, location, party, user, or resource using it's UUID.

type.title: Universally Unique Identifier Reference Type
type.description: Used to indicate the type of object pointed to by the uuid-ref.

title.title: Subject Reference Title
title.description: The title or name for the referenced subject.

risk-mitigating-factor.title: Mitigating Factor
risk-mitigating-factor.description: Describes an existing mitigating factor that may affect the overall determination of the risk, with an optional link to an implementation statement in the SSP.

implementation-uuid.title: Implementation UUID
implementation-uuid.description: Points to an implementation statement in the SSP.

description.title: Mitigating Factor Description
description.description: A human-readable description of this mitigating factor.

risk-response-required-asset-subject-ref.title: Identifies the Subject
risk-response-required-asset-subject-ref.description: A pointer to a resource based on its universally unique identifier (UUID). Use type to indicate whether the identified resource is a component, inventory item, location, user, or something else.

uuid-ref.title: UUID Reference
uuid-ref.description: A pointer to a component, inventory-item, location, party, user, or resource using it's UUID.

type.title: Universally Unique Identifier Reference Type
type.description: Used to indicate the type of object pointed to by the uuid-ref.

title.title: Subject Reference Title
title.description: The title or name for the referenced subject.

risk-response-required-asset.title: Required Asset
risk-response-required-asset.description: Identifies an asset required to achieve remediation.

title.title: Title for Required Asset
title.description: The title for this required asset.

description.title: Description of Required Asset
description.description: A human-readable description of this required asset.

risk-response.title: Risk Response
risk-response.description: Describes either recommended or an actual plan for addressing the risk.

lifecycle.title: Remediation Intent
lifecycle.description: Identifies whether this is a recommendation, such as from an assessor or tool, or an actual plan accepted by the system owner.

title.title: Response Title
title.description: The title for this response activity.

description.title: Response Description
description.description: A human-readable description of this response plan.

risk-risk-log-entry-related-response.title: Action Reference
risk-risk-log-entry-related-response.description: Identifies an individual risk response that this log entry is for.

response-uuid.title: Response Universally Unique Identifier Reference
response-uuid.description: References a unique risk response by UUID.

risk-risk-log-entry.title: Risk Log Entry
risk-risk-log-entry.description: Identifies the result of an action and/or task that occured as part of executing an assessment plan or an assessment event that occured in producing the assessment results.

title.title: Action Title
title.description: The title for this event.

description.title: Action Description
description.description: A human-readable description of this event.

start.title: Start
start.description: Identifies the start date and time of an event.

end.title: End
end.description: Identifies the end date and time of an event. If the event is a point in time, the start and end will be the same date and time.

risk-risk-log.title: Risk Log
risk-risk-log.description: A log of all risk-related actions taken.

risk-related-observation.title: Related Observation
risk-related-observation.description: Relates the finding to a set of referenced observations that were used to determine the finding.

observation-uuid.title: Observation Universally Unique Identifier Reference
observation-uuid.description: References an observation defined in the list of observations.

title.title: Risk Title
title.description: The title for this risk.

description.title: Risk Description
description.description: A human-readable summary of what was identified regarding the risk.

statement.title: Risk Statement
statement.description: An summary of impact for how the risk affects the system.

status.title: Status
status.description: Describes the status of the associated risk.

deadline.title: Risk Resolution Deadline
deadline.description: The date/time by which the risk must be resolved.

logged-by.title: Logged By
logged-by.description: Used to indicate who created a log entry in what role.

party-uuid.title: Party UUID Reference
party-uuid.description: A pointer to the party who is making the log entry.

role-id.title: Actor Role
role-id.description: A point to the role-id of the role in which the party is making the log entry.

risk-status.title: Risk Status
risk-status.description: Describes the status of the associated risk.

characterization-facet.title: Facet
characterization-facet.description: An individual characteristic that is part of a larger set produced by the same actor.

name.title: Facet Name
name.description: The name of the risk metric within the specified system.

system.title: Naming System
system.description: Specifies the naming system under which this risk metric is organized, which allows for the same names to be used in different systems controlled by different parties. This avoids the potential of a name clash.

value.title: Facet Value
value.description: Indicates the value of the facet.

characterization.title: Characterization
characterization.description: A collection of descriptive data about the containing object from a specific origin.

assessment-part.title: Assessment Part
assessment-part.description: A partition of an assessment plan or results or a child of another part.

name.title: Part Name
name.description: A textual label that uniquely identifies the part's semantic type.

ns.title: Part Namespace
ns.description: A namespace qualifying the part's name. This allows different organizations to associate distinct semantics with the same name.

class.title: Part Class
class.description: A textual label that provides a sub-type or characterization of the part's name. This can be used to further distinguish or discriminate between the semantics of multiple parts of the same control with the same name and ns.

title.title: Part Title
title.description: A name given to the part, which may be used by a tool for display and navigation.

prose.title: Part Text
prose.description: Permits multiple paragraphs, lists, tables etc.

related-action.title: Action Reference
related-action.description: Identifies an individual action for which the containing object is a consequence of.

action-uuid.title: Action Universally Unique Identifier Reference
action-uuid.description: References a unique action by UUID.

related-task.title: Task Reference
related-task.description: Identifies an individual task for which the containing object is a consequence of.

task-uuid.title: Task Universally Unique Identifier Reference
task-uuid.description: References a unique task by UUID.

assessment-plan-local-definitions.title: Local Definitions
assessment-plan-local-definitions.description: Used to define data objects that are used in the assessment plan, that do not appear in the referenced SSP.

assessment-plan-terms-and-conditions.title: Assessment Plan Terms and Conditions
assessment-plan-terms-and-conditions.description: Used to define various terms and conditions under which an assessment, described by the plan, can be performed. Each child part defines a different type of term or condition.

assessment-plan.title: Security Assessment Plan (SAP)
assessment-plan.description: An assessment plan, such as those provided by a FedRAMP assessor.

assessment-results-local-definitions.title: Local Definitions
assessment-results-local-definitions.description: Used to define data objects that are used in the assessment plan, that do not appear in the referenced SSP.

assessment-results.title: Security Assessment Results (SAR)
assessment-results.description: Security assessment results, such as those provided by a FedRAMP assessor in the FedRAMP Security Assessment Report.

result-local-definitions.title: Local Definitions
result-local-definitions.description: Used to define data objects that are used in the assessment plan, that do not appear in the referenced SSP.

result-attestation.title: Attestation Statements
result-attestation.description: A set of textual statements, typically written by the assessor.

result-assessment-log-entry.title: Assessment Log Entry
result-assessment-log-entry.description: Identifies the result of an action and/or task that occured as part of executing an assessment plan or an assessment event that occured in producing the assessment results.

title.title: Action Title
title.description: The title for this event.

description.title: Action Description
description.description: A human-readable description of this event.

start.title: Start
start.description: Identifies the start date and time of an event.

end.title: End
end.description: Identifies the end date and time of an event. If the event is a point in time, the start and end will be the same date and time.

result-assessment-log.title: Assessment Log
result-assessment-log.description: A log of all assessment-related actions taken.

result.title: Assessment Result
result.description: Used by the assessment results and POA&M. In the assessment results, this identifies all of the assessment observations and findings, initial and residual risks, deviations, and disposition. In the POA&M, this identifies initial and residual risks, deviations, and disposition.

title.title: Results Title
title.description: The title for this set of results.

description.title: Results Description
description.description: A human-readable description of this set of test results.

start.title: start field
start.description: Date/time stamp identifying the start of the evidence collection reflected in these results.

end.title: end field
end.description: Date/time stamp identifying the end of the evidence collection reflected in these results. In a continuous motoring scenario, this may contain the same value as start if appropriate.

finding-related-observation.title: Related Observation
finding-related-observation.description: Relates the finding to a set of referenced observations that were used to determine the finding.

observation-uuid.title: Observation Universally Unique Identifier Reference
observation-uuid.description: References an observation defined in the list of observations.

finding-associated-risk.title: Associated Risk
finding-associated-risk.description: Relates the finding to a set of referenced risks that were used to determine the finding.

risk-uuid.title: Risk Universally Unique Identifier Reference
risk-uuid.description: References an risk defined in the list of risks.

title.title: Finding Title
title.description: The title for this finding.

description.title: Finding Description
description.description: A human-readable description of this finding.

collected.title: collected field
collected.description: Date/time stamp identifying when the finding information was collected.

expires.title: expires field
expires.description: Date/time identifying when the finding information is out-of-date and no longer valid. Typically used with continuous assessment scenarios.

implementation-statement-uuid.title: Implementation Statement UUID
implementation-statement-uuid.description: Identifies the implementation statement in the SSP to which this finding is related.

import-ap.title: Import Assessment Plan
import-ap.description: Used by assessment-results to import information about the original plan for assessing the system.

href.title: Assessment Plan Reference
href.description: >A resolvable URL reference to the assessment plan governing the assessment activities.

component-definition.title: Component Definition
component-definition.description: A collection of component descriptions, which may optionally be grouped by capability.

import-component-definition.title: Import Component Definition
import-component-definition.description: Loads a component definition from another resource.

href.title: Hyperlink Reference
href.description: A link to a resource that defines a set of components and/or capabilities to import into this collection.

defined-component.title: Component
defined-component.description: A defined component that can be part of an implemented system.

type.title: Component Type
type.description: A category describing the purpose of the component.

title.title: Component Title
title.description: A human readable name for the component.

description.title: Component Description
description.description: A description of the component, including information about its function.

purpose.title: Purpose
purpose.description: A summary of the technological or business purpose of the component.

capability.title: Capability
capability.description: A grouping of other components and/or capabilities.

description.title: Capability Description
description.description: A summary of the capability.

description.title: Component Description
description.description: A description of the component, including information about its function.

control-implementation.title: Control Implementation
control-implementation.description: Describes how the system satisfies a set of controls.

description.title: Control Implementation Description
description.description: A statement describing important things to know about how this set of control satisfaction documentation is approached.

implemented-requirement.title: Control-based Requirement
implemented-requirement.description: Describes how the system satisfies an individual control.

control-id.title: Control Identifier Reference
control-id.description: A reference to a control identifier.

statement.title: Specific Control Statement
statement.description: Identifies which statements within a control are addressed.

profile.title: Profile
profile.description: Each OSCAL profile is defined by a Profile element

import.title: Import resource
import.description: An Import element designates a catalog, profile, or other resource to be included (referenced and potentially modified) by this profile.

href.title: Catalog or Profile Reference
href.description: A resolvable URL reference to the base catalog or profile that this profile is tailoring.

merge.title: Merge controls
merge.description: A Merge element merges controls in resolution.

combine.title: Combination rule
combine.description: A Combine element defines whether and how to combine multiple (competing) versions of the same control

method.title: Combination method
method.description: How clashing controls should be handled

as-is.title: As is
as-is.description: An As-is element indicates that the controls should be structured in resolution as they are structured in their source catalogs. It does not contain any elements or attributes.

custom.title: Custom grouping
custom.description: A Custom element frames a structure for embedding represented controls in resolution.

modify.title: Modify controls
modify.description: Set parameters or amend controls in resolution

include.title: Include controls
include.description: Specifies which controls to include from the resource (source catalog) being imported

all.title: Include all
all.description: Include all controls from the imported resource (catalog)

with-child-controls.title: Include contained controls with control
with-child-controls.description: When a control is included, whether its child (dependent) controls are also included.

call.title: Call
call.description: Call a control by its ID

control-id.title: Control ID
control-id.description: Value of the 'id' flag on a target control

with-child-controls.title: Include contained controls with control
with-child-controls.description: When a control is included, whether its child (dependent) controls are also included.

match.title: Match controls by identifier
match.description: Select controls by (regular expression) match on ID

pattern.title: Pattern
pattern.description: A regular expression matching the IDs of one or more controls to be selected

order.title: Order
order.description: A designation of how a selection of controls in a profile is to be ordered.

with-child-controls.title: Include contained controls with control
with-child-controls.description: When a control is included, whether its child (dependent) controls are also included.

exclude.title: Exclude controls
exclude.description: Which controls to exclude from the resource (source catalog) being imported

alter.title: Alteration
alter.description: An Alter element specifies changes to be made to an included control when a profile is resolved.

control-id.title: Control ID
control-id.description: Value of the 'id' flag on a target control

remove.title: Removal
remove.description: Specifies elements to be removed from a control, in resolution

name-ref.title: Reference by (assigned) name
name-ref.description: Items to remove, by assigned name

class-ref.title: Reference by class
class-ref.description: Items to remove, by class. A token match.

id-ref.title: Reference by ID
id-ref.description: Items to remove, indicated by their IDs

item-name.title: References by item name or generic identifier
item-name.description: Items to remove, by the name of the item's type, or generic identifier, e.g. title or prop

add.title: Addition
add.description: Specifies contents to be added into controls, in resolution

position.title: Position
position.description: Where to add the new content with respect to the targeted element (beside it or inside it)

title.title: Title Change
title.description: A name given to the control, which may be used by a tool for display and navigation.

plan-of-action-and-milestones.title: Plan of Action and Milestones (POA&M)
plan-of-action-and-milestones.description: A plan of action and milestones which identifies initial and residual risks, deviations, and disposition, such as those required by FedRAMP.

local-definitions.title: Local Definitions
local-definitions.description: Allows components, and inventory-items to be defined within the POA&M for circumstances where no OSCAL-based SSP exists, or is not delivered with the POA&M.

poam-item-related-observation.title: Related Observation
poam-item-related-observation.description: Relates the poam-item to a set of referenced observations that were used to determine the finding.

observation-uuid.title: Observation Universally Unique Identifier Reference
observation-uuid.description: References an observation defined in the list of observations.

poam-item-associated-risk.title: Associated Risk
poam-item-associated-risk.description: Relates the finding to a set of referenced risks that were used to determine the finding.

risk-uuid.title: Risk Universally Unique Identifier Reference
risk-uuid.description: References an risk defined in the list of risks.

title.title: POA&M Item Title
title.description: The title or name for this POA&M item .

description.title: POA&M Item Description
description.description: A human-readable description of POA&M item.

collected.title: collected field
collected.description: Date/time stamp identifying when the finding information was collected.

expires.title: expires field
expires.description: Date/time identifying when the finding information is out-of-date and no longer valid. Typically used with continuous assessment scenarios.

system-security-plan.title: System Security Plan (SSP)
system-security-plan.description: A system security plan, such as those described in NIST SP 800-18

import-profile.title: Import Profile
import-profile.description: Used to import the OSCAL profile representing the system's control baseline.

href.title: Profile Reference
href.description: A resolvable URL reference to the profile to use as the system's control baseline.

system-characteristics-status.title: Status
system-characteristics-status.description: Describes the operational status of the system.

system-characteristics.title: System Characteristics
system-characteristics.description: Contains the characteristics of the system, such as its name, purpose, and security impact level.

system-name.title: System Name - Full
system-name.description: The full name of the system.

system-name-short.title: System Name - Short
system-name-short.description: A short name for the system, such as an acronym, that is suitable for display in a data table or summary list.

description.title: System Description
description.description: A summary of the system.

date-authorized.title: System Authorization Date
date-authorized.description: The date the system received its authorization.

security-sensitivity-level.title: Security Sensitivity Level
security-sensitivity-level.description: The overall information system sensitivity categorization, such as defined by FIPS-199.

system-information-information-type-cate.title: Information Type Systemized Identifier
system-information-information-type-cate.description: An identifier qualified by the given identification system used, such as NIST SP 800-60.

system-information-information-type-cate.title: Information Type Categorization
system-information-information-type-cate.description: A set of information type identifiers qualified by the given identification system used, such as NIST SP 800-60.

system.title: Information Type Identification System
system.description: Specifies the information type identification system used.

system-information-information-type-conf.title: Confidentiality Impact Level
system-information-information-type-conf.description: The expected level of impact resulting from the unauthorized disclosure of the described information.

base.title: Base Level (Confidentiality, Integrity, or Availability)
base.description: The prescribed base (Confidentiality, Integrity, or Availability) security impact level.

selected.title: Selected Level (Confidentiality, Integrity, or Availability)
selected.description: The selected (Confidentiality, Integrity, or Availability) security impact level.

adjustment-justification.title: Adjustment Justification
adjustment-justification.description: If the selected security level is different from the base security level, this contains the justification for the change.

system-information-information-type-inte.title: Integrity Impact Level
system-information-information-type-inte.description: The expected level of impact resulting from the unauthorized modification of the described information.

base.title: Base Level (Confidentiality, Integrity, or Availability)
base.description: The prescribed base (Confidentiality, Integrity, or Availability) security impact level.

selected.title: Selected Level (Confidentiality, Integrity, or Availability)
selected.description: The selected (Confidentiality, Integrity, or Availability) security impact level.

adjustment-justification.title: Adjustment Justification
adjustment-justification.description: If the selected security level is different from the base security level, this contains the justification for the change.

system-information-information-type-avai.title: Availability Impact Level
system-information-information-type-avai.description: The expected level of impact resulting from the disruption of access to or use of the described information or the information system.

base.title: Base Level (Confidentiality, Integrity, or Availability)
base.description: The prescribed base (Confidentiality, Integrity, or Availability) security impact level.

selected.title: Selected Level (Confidentiality, Integrity, or Availability)
selected.description: The selected (Confidentiality, Integrity, or Availability) security impact level.

adjustment-justification.title: Adjustment Justification
adjustment-justification.description: If the selected security level is different from the base security level, this contains the justification for the change.

system-information-information-type.title: Information Type
system-information-information-type.description: Contains details about one information type that is stored, processed, or transmitted by the system, such as privacy information, and those defined in NIST SP 800-60.

title.title: title field
title.description: A human readable name for the information type. This title should be meaningful within the context of the system.

description.title: Information Type Description
description.description: A summary of how this information type is used within the system.

system-information.title: System Information
system-information.description: Contains details about all information types that are stored, processed, or transmitted by the system, such as privacy information, and those defined in NIST SP 800-60.

security-impact-level.title: Security Impact Level
security-impact-level.description: The overall level of expected impact resulting from unauthorized disclosure, modification, or loss of access to information.

security-objective-confidentiality.title: Security Objective: Confidentiality
security-objective-confidentiality.description: A target-level of confidentiality for the system, based on the sensitivity of information within the system.

security-objective-integrity.title: Security Objective: Integrity
security-objective-integrity.description: A target-level of integrity for the system, based on the sensitivity of information within the system.

security-objective-availability.title: Security Objective: Availability
security-objective-availability.description: A target-level of availability for the system, based on the sensitivity of information within the system.

authorization-boundary.title: Authorization Boundary
authorization-boundary.description: A description of this system's authorization boundary, optionally supplemented by diagrams that illustrate the authorization boundary.

description.title: Authorization Boundary Description
description.description: A summary of the system's authorization boundary.

remarks.title: remarks field
remarks.description: Commentary about the system's authorization boundary that enhances the diagram.

diagram.title: Diagram
diagram.description: A graphic that provides a visual representation the system, or some aspect of it.

description.title: Diagram Description
description.description: A summary of the diagram.

caption.title: Caption
caption.description: A brief caption to annotate the diagram.

remarks.title: remarks field
remarks.description: Commentary about the diagram that enhances it.

network-architecture.title: Network Architecture
network-architecture.description: A description of the system's network architecture, optionally supplemented by diagrams that illustrate the network architecture.

description.title: Network Architecture Description
description.description: A summary of the system's network architecture.

data-flow.title: Data Flow
data-flow.description: A description of the logical flow of information within the system and across its boundaries, optionally supplemented by diagrams that illustrate these flows.

description.title: Data Flow Description
description.description: A summary of the system's data flow.

system-implementation-leveraged-authoriz.title: Leveraged Authorization
system-implementation-leveraged-authoriz.description: A description of another authorized system from which this system inherits capabilities that satisfy security requirements. Another term for this concept is a common control provider.

title.title: title field
title.description: A human readable name for the leveraged authorization in the context of the system.

party-uuid.title: party-uuid field
party-uuid.description: A reference to the party that manages the leveraged system.

date-authorized.title: System Authorization Date
date-authorized.description: The date the system received its authorization.

system-implementation.title: System Implementation
system-implementation.description: Provides information as to how the system is implemented.

by-component-export-provided.title: Provided Control Implementation
by-component-export-provided.description: Describes a capability which may be inherited by a leveraging system.

description.title: Provided Control Implementation Description
description.description: An implementation statement that describes the aspects of the control or control statement implementation that can be provided to another system leveraging this system.

by-component-export-responsibility.title: Control Implementation Responsibility
by-component-export-responsibility.description: Describes a control implementation responsibiity imposed on a leveraging system.

provided-uuid.title: Provided UUID
provided-uuid.description: Identifies a 'provided' assembly associated with this assembly.

description.title: Control Implementation Responsibility Description
description.description: An implementation statement that describes the aspects of the control or control statement implementation that a leveraging system must implement to satisfy the control provided by a leveraged system.

by-component-export.title: Export
by-component-export.description: Identifies content intended for external consumption, such as with leveraged organizations.

description.title: Control Implementation Export Description
description.description: An implementation statement that describes the aspects of the control or control statement implementation that can be available to another system leveraging this system.

by-component-inherited.title: Inherited Control Implementation
by-component-inherited.description: Describes a control implementation inherited by a leveraging system.

provided-uuid.title: Provided UUID
provided-uuid.description: Identifies a 'provided' assembly associated with this assembly.

description.title: Inherited Control Implementation Description
description.description: An implementation statement that describes the aspects of a control or control statement implementation that a leveraging system is inheriting from a leveraged system.

by-component-satisfied.title: Satisfied Control Implementation Responsibility
by-component-satisfied.description: Describes how this system satisfies a responsibiity imposed by a leveraged system.

responsibility-uuid.title: Provided UUID
responsibility-uuid.description: Identifies a 'provided' assembly associated with this assembly.

description.title: Satisfied Control Implementation Responsibility Description
description.description: An implementation statement that describes the aspects of a control or control statement implementation that a leveraging system is implementing based on a requirement from a leveraged system.

by-component.title: Component Control Implementation
by-component.description: Defines how the referenced component implements a set of controls.

description.title: Control Implementation Description
description.description: An implementation statement that describes how a control or a control statement is implemented within the referenced system component.
